text: The Mayor, pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of §§ 47-857.11 through 47-857.16.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 7042(b) of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-223, see notes following § 47-355.05.

DC CODE § 47-857.16

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Real Property Assessment and Tax. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Authority and Procedure to Establish Real Property Tax Rates.

heading.catch_text: Tax abatements for nonprofit organizations locating in emerging commercial neighborhoods--Rules.
